review_data.title: Best neighborhood bar!

review_data.title: Great bar
review_data.content: From a first minute here you can feel yourself like in a company of good friends. Very good atmosphere! 😀

review_data.title: So geil immer!
review_data.content: Mein Gott, so viel Spass immer dort! Richtiger Platz, richter Ort, rictigen Leute. So geil! Zum Wohl zäme!

review_data.title: Best place to be in Zürich town
review_data.content: Laid back - great owner and best beer 😀 go there if you have time - easy to reach- good atmosphere - funky funky music - music on your own joice - uncomplicated - SIMPLY the BEST

review_data.title: Best Bar in the Enge Area
review_data.content: Moved to Zurich recently and was very pleased to find the Bar Enge close by. A small and friendly bar with a great atmosphere and host in Michael. Good beers and bar snacks, with a treat on occasion of home made delicacies to be shared...More

review_data.title: Drinks
review_data.content: Nice shots and nice drinks ✌ You can meet a lot of nice and friendly people. Best place in town....👌

review_data.title: Great place for Plzen beer
review_data.content: Wonderful place, cozy,very friendly owner,great beer and you can play your music. Fair prices. Really enjoyed going into this pub.

review_data.title: Kleine, sympathische Bar

review_data.title: Best Indian lunch in the Bahnhof Enge area
review_data.content: The bar is really small and most people get take-away at lunchtime, but they serve up a mean curry. Fresh ingredients, relatively light cuisine, super friendly and slightly nerdy staff. This is the best place I have found so far for warm aromatic quick eats...More

review_data.title: Einfach sympathisch

review_data.title: Great place for partying

review_data.title: Friendliest bar in Zurich

review_data.title: What an awesome pub

review_data.title: A great bar and the best Pilsner Urquell outside Pilsen!!!!
review_data.content: I use this bar quite regularly after work, it isn't a large bar, but what it lacks in size it makes up for in intimacy!!! The crowd is quite an eclectic mix of locals, bankers and symphony musicians(ie; my colleagues and I!). Michael the barman...More

review_data.title: Best Indian foods

review_data.title: Sympathische Bar in der Enge
review_data.content: Sympathische, kleine, aber feine Bar direkt gegenüber dem Bahnhof Enge, Zürich. Ideal für After Work Drinks, Feierabendbier, Schauen eines Fussballspiels,...More

review_data.title: Good and authentic Pakistani / Indian Lunch
review_data.content: For a quick, self-service lunch at very reasonable prices, I'd recommend Bar Enge. From Monday to Friday, a friendly cook serves authentic Pakistani meals. I really like the dishes since they are really something different compared to the Swiss-traditional Indian-style Restaurants throughout Zurich.
